summary: The diff shows new computations for revision progress (total/completed/remaining) and per-session status flags (completed/overdue/today/future) in `SubTopicScheduleView.tsx`, but the provided snippet is truncated before any JSX that actually renders the progress indicator or applies green/red/neutral styling to the schedule list items. Based on the available evidence, the requested UI outcomes cannot be fully verified as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display a progress indicator in the Subtopic revision schedule dialog showing completed revisions out of total planned revisions (denominator matches planned revision sessions excluding Study Date; completed count capped).
missing_requirements.reason: While progress metrics are computed (`totalRevisions`, `completedRevisions` capped, `remainingRevisions`), the diff excerpt is truncated before any JSX that renders a visible progress indicator (e.g., "Progress: 4/5" or "1/5 remaining"). Therefore implementation of the user-facing indicator cannot be confirmed from the provided diff.

missing_requirements.reason: The code computes flags (`isCompleted`, `isOverdue`) per date item, but the diff excerpt is truncated before the schedule list rendering where these flags would be mapped to green/red/neutral styles and any English status labels/badges. Therefore the required visual indication cannot be verified from the provided diff.
